_comment: bench-05 file generation expectations. 3 auto-migrated components + 1 service.

_engine_failure_modes.q_defer_not_manual: If OrderController is SAFE/RISKY, WatcherRiskRule is not reading q_defer from change.reason
_engine_failure_modes.risk_contamination: If SearchController or AdminController is MANUAL, risk isolation is broken
_engine_failure_modes.shallow_watch_safe: SearchController has 2 writes â€” must be SAFE not RISKY (threshold is 6)
_engine_failure_modes.behaviorsubject_injected: SearchController shallow watch must trigger SimpleWatchToRxjsRule
_engine_failure_modes.http_attribution: Admin $http.get calls must go to admin.component.ts not app.component.ts
_engine_failure_modes.threshold_sensitivity: AdminController 5 writes at threshold=6 is SAFE. Changing threshold to 5 flips it to RISKY. Benchmark is written for threshold=6.
